    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Administrator
    The Administrator class extends the User class and represents an administrator
    AdministratorMenu
    The AdministratorMenu class provides the interface and functionality for an administrator to manage hospital staff, inventory, appointments, and more.
    Appointment
    Represents an appointment in the system, including details about the doctor, patient, date, time, status, and an optional outcome record.
    AppointmentDB
    A database class to manage Appointment objects.
    AppointmentManager
     
    AppointmentOutcomeManager
     
    AppointmentOutcomeRecord
    Represents the outcome of an appointment, including details such as services provided, prescriptions, consultation notes, and the prescription status.
    AppointmentOutcomeRecordDB
    A database class to manage AppointmentOutcomeRecord objects.
    AuthenticationManager
     
    Database<T>
    An abstract generic class that defines the structure for a database.
    DatabaseManager
     
    Diagnosis
    The Diagnosis class represents a medical diagnosis made for a patient.
    Doctor
    Represents a Doctor user in the hospital system, extending the User class.
    DoctorMenu
    The DoctorMenu class represents the menu interface for a doctor, allowing them to interact with patient medical records, manage their schedule, set availability, and record appointment outcome record.
    DoctorUnavailabilityDB
    A class that manages doctor unavailability slots in the database.
    DoctorUnavailableSlots
    Represents an unavailable slot for a doctor on a specific date and time.
    HospitalManagementSystem
    The HospitalManagementSystem class is the main entry point for the hospital management application.
    InventoryManager
    The InventoryManager class provides methods for managing the inventory of medicines, including adding, updating, removing, and displaying medicines.
    MedicalRecord
    The MedicalRecord class represents a comprehensive record of a patient's medical history.
    MedicalRecordDB
    A class that manages medical records in the database.
    MedicalRecordManager
     
    Medicine
    The Medicine class represents a medical item with an ID, name, dosage, stock level, and a low stock alert threshold.
    MedicineDB
    A class that manages medicines in the database.
    Patient
     
    PatientMenu
    The PatientMenu class provides an interface for a patient to manage various tasks such as viewing medical records, updating personal information, scheduling and rescheduling appointments, and viewing appointment outcomes.
    Pharmacist
    The Pharmacist class extends the User class and represents a pharmacist user in the system.
    PharmacistMenu
    The PharmacistMenu class provides an interface for a pharmacist to manage various tasks such as viewing appointment outcomes, updating prescription statuses, managing medication inventory, and submitting replenishment requests.
    Prescription
    The Prescription class represents a medical prescription for a patient.
    ReplenishmentDB
    A class that manages replenishment requests in the database.
    ReplenishmentRequest
    The ReplenishmentRequest class handles the creation, updating, and display of replenishment requests for medicines.
    Treatment
    The Treatment class represents a medical treatment that has been administered to a patient.
    User
    The User class represents a generic user in the hospital system with basic properties such as ID, name, role, password, contact information, date of birth, and gender.
    UserDB
    Manages a collection of users, providing methods for creating, retrieving, updating, deleting, and saving user data to a CSV file.
    ValidationUtils
    The ValidationUtils class provides utility methods for validating user input, such as phone numbers, email addresses, and passwords.
